sentences.en: "Look," she said, getting a brainstorm, "Why don't you invite them here?"
sentences.cn: “对了，”她灵机一动说道，“你干吗不请他们到这儿来？”

sentences.en: After months of futile labor , the scientist suddenly had a brainstorm and solved the problem.
sentences.cn: 数月努力,徒劳无功, 科学家突发奇想,问题迎刃而解.

sentences.en: Brainstorm all the ways your visitor would think of your product.
sentences.cn: 绞尽脑汁地想出访问者对你的产品所可能有的一切想法.

sentences.en: Brainstorm and list possible failure conditions and alternate success conditions.
sentences.cn: 用脑力激?法穷举可能的失败条件与替代路径成功条件.

sentences.en: Brainstorm and list the primary actors'goals against the system ( actor - goal list ).
sentences.cn: 用脑力激荡法穷举系统中主要参与者的使用者目标 ( 参与者 — 目标清单 ).

sentences.en: I can have a brainstorm and be very extravagant.
sentences.cn: 我有时会头脑发热，挥霍无度。

sentences.en: I must have had a brainstorm I couldn't remember my own telephone number for a moment.
sentences.cn: 我一定是糊涂了--一时想不起自己的电话号码了.

sentences.en: It will be a good idea to brainstorm and a fish - bone diagram.
sentences.cn: 使用头脑风暴法以及鱼骨图会是个不错的主意.

sentences.en: Ryan goes home to brainstorm how to fight that bucket.
sentences.cn: 雷恩回家去好好想办法对付那个水桶.

sentences.en: She brainstormed the possible approaches she might take.
sentences.cn: 她用头脑风暴法想出了她可以采取的可能方法。

sentences.en: The news of his son's death caused him to have a brainstorm.
sentences.cn: 他儿子的死讯使他得了脑猝病。

sentences.en: The women meet twice a month to brainstorm and set business goals for each other.
sentences.cn: 她们每个月聚会两次，在一起出谋献策，为各自制定生意目标。

sentences.en: They all help brainstorm ideas and design new products.
sentences.cn: 他们经常相互脑力激荡,设计出新产品.

sentences.en: This is especially true for creative meetings or brainstorm sessions.
sentences.cn: 尤其是在创意会议或头脑风暴类的会议中.

sentences.en: We can brainstorm a list of the most influential individuals in the company.
sentences.cn: 我们可以集体讨论，列出该公司中最有影响的人员的名单。

sentences.en: We need to come up with new ideas so let's brainstorm first.
sentences.cn: 我们必须想出些新点子,所以就让我们先作脑力激荡.

sentences.en: While some of the greatest ideas and solutions come up in brainstorm meetings, we also lose most of our time in discussion without action.
sentences.cn: 当在头脑风暴的会议上有一些顶级的主意或者解决方法提出时，我们也浪费了很多时间在没有行动的讨论上。
